name: Rustcrawler
description: A hulking drone covered in layers of corroded metal plates and exposed circuitry. Rust streaks down its limbs like crimson scars, constantly shedding flakes of oxidized steel. Its eyes are dull red LED orbs that scan the environment with unsettling intensity.

flavor.rationale: Spawned as part of a MOB_INVASION event. A repurposed factory drone driven mad by a malfunctioning Rust mutation and now roaming the streets scavenging for anything to feed its decaying body, attacking anyone who gets in its way.
